definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: Cryogenic liquid cylinders are insulated, vacuum-jacketed, pressure vessels.

sentences.english: Using a pressure pressure it was possible to achieve temperatures in the vicinity of 115℃.

sentences.english: Today, welding is the most commonly used method of fabrication of pressure vessels.
